name: @fluidframework/eslint-config-fluid
description: Shareable ESLint config for the Fluid Framework
author: Microsoft and contributors

scripts.print-config: npm run print-config:default && npm run print-config:default-test
scripts.print-config:default: eslint --config minimal.js --print-config src/file.ts > printed-configs/default.json && sort-json printed-configs/default.json --spaces=4
scripts.print-config:default-test: eslint --config minimal.js --print-config src/test/file.ts > printed-configs/default-test.json && sort-json printed-configs/default-test.json --spaces=4
